page.title: 19CHARITIES DOWNDERRY
page.content: FOR A SMALL COMMUNITY,DOWNDERRY SEEMS EFFECTIVELY TO SUPPORT A LARGE NUMBER OF CHARITIES.THE GREATEST EFFORTS RAISE MONEY FOR THE NATIONAL CANCER APPEAL & THE MOUNT EDGECUMBE HOSPICE FOR CANCER CARE IN CORNWALL.OTHER GROUPS SUPPORT FUNDS FOR RESEARCH & TREATMENT OF ARTHRITIS,HEART DISEASE, DEAFNESS,& FOR THE{SAVE THE CHILDREN {FUND}.ANIMAL WELFARE GROUPS eg NATURE CONSERVATION, CATS & DOGS HOME,RSPCA, & ANTI-VIVISECTION ARE SUPPORTED.THE LIFEBOAT & THE SERVICES APPEALS LIKE POPPY DAYS ARE RELEVANT HERE. UNTIL RECENTLY THE LOCAL MEMORIAL GARDENS IN MEMORY OF THE DEAD OF TWO WORLD WARS WAS ADMINISTERED HERE.ANNUALLY THESE GROUPS PLUS GUIDES,BROWNIES,SCOUTS, CUBS,CHURCHES,SCHOOLS,W.I., ETC.RALLY TOGETHER TO RUN A XMAS BAZAAR IN THE VILLAGE HALL .THE SECRET OF SUCCESS IS THAT THE EVENTS ARE WELCOME SOCIALLY
